text: Marko Mijović (born October 5, 1987) is a Montenegrin professional basketball player for Mornar Bar of the Montenegrin League. ==External links== * at Eurobasket.com * at FIBA.com * at aba-liga.com * at BGBasket.com ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:ABA League players Category:KK Mornar Bar players Category:KK Radnički Obrenovac players Category:Montenegrin expatriate basketball people in Serbia Category:Montenegrin men's basketball players Category:People from Bar, Montenegro Category:Point guards
title: Marko Mijović
